SA15bsa059_u:3: ātmani cittaspandanapūrvau kriyābhilāpau dṛṣṭvānyatra tayordarśanādyadi spandanamanumīyeta,
SA15bsa059_u:6: tacca kāyavāgvijñaptipratibhāsi jñānaṃ jñānāntaraspandanaveśeṣeṇa vinā bhavatyevaṃ na matam / [1-3]
SA15bsa059_u:7: atha parajñānasya kriyānupalambhāt paradhīranumātuṃ na yujyata iti cet?
SA15bsa059_u:8: na; tulyatvāt paro 'pi parajñānapūrvau tau kadāpi na paśyati 'taḥ tenāpi tanna jñāyate / [4-5]
SA15bsa059_u:9: ātmanaścittasya paravartinornimittatvānupapatteḥ paracittaṃ jñāyata iti cet /
SA15bsa059_u:10: kiṃ na yujyate? svasamutthāpakacittasya pratisaṃvedanābhāvāt, ātmacittaśrayiṇoścātmani darśanāt /
SA15bsa059_u:14: svacittaspandananimittake vijñaptipratibhāsinī jñāne cāntarmukhapratibhāsinī pratīteḥ bahirmukhapratibhāsinī anyanimittadutpadyete / [6-12]
SA15bsa059_u:15: animitte eva bahirmukhapratibhāsinīti kinneṣyate cet? animittatve sarvasyānimittatvaṃ prasajyeta /
SA15bsa059_u:18: tathā sati, avicchinnatvaviśiṣṭaḥ pratibhāsabheda eva spandanapūrvako na bhavati /
SA15bsa059_u:22: tena hyatra kriyāviśeṣamātreṇa spandanasya pratītiritī yujyate /
SA15bsa059_u:23: tatra yadi kasyacidpūrvakatvam, na ko 'pi tatpūrvakaḥ syāt, viśeṣābhāvāt /
SA15bsa059_u:28: tenāvaśyaṃ tau spandananimittakatvāt tadbhāve na bhavata iti vaktavyam /
SA15bsa059_u:33: paro 'pi svapnopalabdhaparakriyābhilāpau spandananimittakāviti kinna vadati? tayorabhāvāditi cet /
SA15bsa059_u:35: atha middhenopahatatvāt puruṣasya arthaśūnyaṃ vijñānaṃ jāyata iti cet /
SA15bsa059_u:37: atha svapne 'pi jñānasyārthavattvāttadopalabhyamānā api parasantānā eveti cet /
SA15bsa059_u:38: paraṃ prativigrahītuṃ yadi yuktyāgamarahitastathāvidho 'sad vādaḥ samāśriyeta,
SA15bsa059_u:39: tadā parābhimataṃ tasya parāyattatvaṃ na ko 'pi nivārayet /
SA15bsa059_u:40: etatkeṣañcinmata eva sarvāṇi tathāvidhāni jñānāni santānāntarāyattāni /
SA15bsa059_u:42: kadācit svapne 'pi tasya sākṣāt santānāntarayattā iṣṭaiva; devādyadhiṣṭhānataḥ satyasvapnadarśanāt /
SA15bsa059_u:44: tāvattayā kriyayāpi taccittaṃ kathaṃ jñāyate? cittasya kāryatvāt /
SA15bsa059_u:45: tasya kāryatvaṃ tu cittāntare 'pi tulyamiti kathanna jñāyate?
SA15bsa059_u:50: tada tatra kimanayā paramparayā - paracittāt kriyā,
SA15bsa059_u:55: spandanamātrasāmānyaṃ kriyābhilāpajñānasāmānyasya kāraṇatvāt kāryeṇa kāraṇasya gatiḥ /
SA15bsa059_u:58: etayoḥ saḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ svāpādyavasthāyāmitarasyāmapi ca samānaḥ /
SA15bsa059_u:59: bhrāntyavasthāyāṃ yathāsvaṃ pratyayaviśeṣopāśrayāt paraspandanadinimittodbhūtavijñānavāsanaiva kadācitparābhogādeḥ vyavahitādapi vṛttiṃ labhate:
SA15bsa059_u:62: kriyātaḥ spandanapratipattau svāpa itarasmiñca syātpratipattiratha vā naiva kadācana /
SA15bsa059_u:66: bhrāntyavasthānāṃ kriyaiva na bhavati, arthaśūnyajñānodayānna doṣaḥ /
SA15bsa059_u:67: sarvaprakāravyapadeśasāmyāt kadācijjñānamarthaśūnyam, anyadānyathā ityeṣo 'dhikāraḥ kuto labdhaḥ?
SA15bsa059_u:70: tathā sati arthāntaravādahānyā ete 'nekāśakyanigūhanadoṣaprasaṅgāḥ mahākṛcchrā uttereṇaikena nihatā bhavanti / [52-58]
SA15bsa059_u:71: nanu tayoḥ darśanāt kāyavāgvijñaptibhyāṃ svamutthāpakacittasyānumānamiti nyāyyam /
SA15bsa059_u:74: nocyate paracittasamutthitavijñaptirūpatvāttatra pratibhāsijñānena samutthāpakacittaṃ gamyata iti /
SA15bsa059_u:84: kiñca kriyādipratibhāsivijñānāt kāryaliṅgājjātaṃ yatparacittajñānaṃ tatparacittaṃ viṣayīkriyata āhosvinna?
SA15bsa059_u:86: aviṣayatve tu kathaṃ jñānena paracittasattā pratīyate?
SA15bsa059_u:89: kriyāvāgbhyāṃ paracittaṃ pratipattimatāmapi tatsvarūpaviṣayīkaraṇe svacittajñānavat tadākārasyāpi jñānaṃ prasajyeta /
SA15bsa059_u:90: tadajñāne tu tena tatsvarūpasya grahaṇaṃ katham? [65-67]
SA15bsa059_u:91: atha liṅgāt sāmānyadhigateḥ nākārasya pratītiriti cet?
SA15bsa059_u:93: anyatvāvācyatvayorekatve tvanena tatsāmānyameva gṛhyeta, na paracittam /
SA15bsa059_u:94: tatkathamanena tad gamyate? nāpi sāmānyaṃ paracittameva /
SA15bsa059_u:95: tathā sati tadākārasyāpi jñānaṃ prasahyeta ityuktam / [86-71]
SA15bsa059_u:104: tatpravartanadvāreṇa prāṇyantarasattāṃ pratipadya punaḥ punarvyavahārapravṛttau tadādhipatyādāgārthasya prāpteḥ /
SA15bsa059_u:109: na tanmātreṇa pūrvajñānasya prāmāṇyaṃ yujyate, tadānīṃ sarveṣāṃ jñānānāṃ bhrāntatvāt /
SA15bsa059_u:110: tatra vijñaptijñānaṃ na kadāciccittaspandanādhipatyena vinā udbhavatītyataḥ tābhyāṃ ye anumīyate /
SA15bsa059_u:111: bhrāntivaśāt kadācid vyavahite 'pi udeti, na tu tadādhipatyarahitatvam /
SA15bsa059_u:113: tatra yathā pūrvavijñaptijñānānāṃ paramparayā spandanādhipatyādudayaḥ tathā taduttarāvasthābhāvināmapi /
SA15bsa059_u:115: tatrāpi yādṛganumānaṃ tādṛgavisaṃvādo vyavahāraścāpyastyeveti kenāpi na gṛhyate / [82-86]
SA15bsa059_u:118: yadi te paracittasya svarūpaṃ sākṣājjānanti, tadā tasyārthāntaragrahaṇaṃ syāt /
SA15bsa059_u:119: atha na jānanti, kathaṃ te sākṣādvidaḥ? kathaṃ nāma pratyakṣeṇārthasvarūpasya agrahaṇaṃ ca bhavati /
SA15bsa059_u:120: atha na gṛhyate, kathaṃ tarhi pramāṇamiti cet?
SA15bsa059_u:126: te 'pi tadākārasadṛśasvacittapratibhāsameva jānantītyevamavadhāraṇād paracittavida iti vyavahāraḥ /
SA15bsa059_u:127: tadākārānukārisfuṭābhatvāt tatpratyakṣam, avisaṃvāditvācca pramāṇam iti matam /
SA15bsa059_u:128: acintyo hi bhagavataḥ sarvārthādhigamaḥ, sarvathā jñānabhidhānaviṣayātītatvāt // [87-93]
